MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA18 postcode area of Ochiltree,Cumnock, affecting properties in Main Street and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site at Ochiltree substation and in order to complete a repair on electrical equipment, we may need to carry out an emergency shutdown . This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.32am on Tuesday 2nd March 2021
